turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. which starbucks did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick up from the Starbucks on Germantown Avenue in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. It's in the Chestnut Hill section of the city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ALright and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I do not want any whipped cream, but I would like the caramel drizzle on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a venti 2% caramel macchiato with caramel syrup drizzle from the starbucks on Germantown Avenue in Chestnut hills.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Thank you so much.
